name: Turned House
description:
WARNING: CONTAINS JUMP SCARES! VIEWER DISCRETION ADVISED!

Keep unwanted guests out by using the lights. Watch the power, or it's lights out! Can you survive?

Donate here:https://www.patreon.com/user?u=2880478&ty=h

What's new(ver 1.1.4: the bright idea):

-Lights are brighter

-You can now use space to toggle the lights

-Visual effects added.
